name: Tokyo Majin Gakuen: Fuju Houroku
overview: Despite being a card battle, Tokyo Majin Gakuen: Fujin Gakuen: Fujin Spell Sealoku has a large 64M ROM, beautiful graphics and high quality sound. Based on the world of Tokyo Majin Gakuen: Kenpucho, which was released on the PlayStation, Fuju Houroku consists of a newly drawn scenario. The adventure part features an emotion input system that allows players to input their emotions in eight different ways, while the card generation system, which creates more than 120,000 different cards, is used in the card battles. The game also incorporates the concepts of yin and yang and the five elements of shikigami and hōjutsu, and features more than 150 characters from "~Kenpūcho", the fan disc "~Oboro Kitan", and the CD drama "~Demajin", giving this game a full range of Tokyo Majin Gakuen flavors.
